column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////One mission this trip --- some deep dish on a super cold day before flying home.  Debated a personal or small classic --- sausage
column2: melty cheese and the butter crust.  Lauren S.
column3: my very efficient and just attentive enough server explained the options
column4: and i settled for the small. I skipped lunch after all for this.  She said it would be 40 minutes
column5: but it was out in 30... they neatly serve up the first slice and off you go.  As advertised and expected --- nice thick
column7: plenty of cheese and generous sausage.  They really promote ordering it "your way" which is a nice touch --- less sausage
